title: Fort Bragg Has Had a Rash of Mysterious Deaths, Have Spiked 1000% Since Vaccines Started
cleaned_text: Over the past 18 months, Fort Bragg – one of the world’s largest military installations – has been plagued with a rash of sudden and unexpected deaths of spoilers stationed there. Fort Bragg has around 54,000 military personnel, including Special Forces, the Joint Special Operations Command and the Airborne Corps, and in a year and a half, 80 soldiers have died suddenly and as such, the cause has not been explained. Officials said that thirty-three of those deaths are still “undetermined” as to the cause and three Fort Bragg soldiers died in combat overseas. Seth Harp, an investigative reporter for Rolling Stone Magazine, reported that 83 soldiers at Fort Bragg had died over an eighteen-month period. He also revealed that in that eighteen-month period, ending June 2021 bodies had been piling up at Fort Bragg, after that point, Fort Bragg stopped reporting on any deaths. “Fort Bragg soldiers have been turning up ‘unresponsive’ in their barracks on a disturbingly regular basis since the beginning of 2020, including Caleb Smither, Terrance Salazar, Jamie Boger, Joshua Diamond, Matthew Disney, Mikel Rubino, Michael Hamilton, and numerous others who have not been named.” Two soldiers – Joshua Diamon and Matthew Disney – died on the same day, both had drugs involved in their deaths and two weeks later, Airborne Master sergeant Martin Acevedo III, was caught trafficking cocaine. Army captain Robert Latham, died from an “apparent heart attack” despite only being 32 and physically fit and another physically fit, 38 year old Green Beret, Calvin Rockward, also died from an apparent “sudden, unexpected medical event.” Nine others met a similar mysterious fate, and according to Seth, the U.S Army and Fort Bragg are refusing to investigate what is causing the surge in deaths and have no desire to report on the deaths. It’s possible there is a combination of things going on, and one could speculate that there seems to be a drug problem at Fort Bragg. The recent cocaine trafficking bust of Acevedo III, is a strong indicator that may be true. The other possibility is soldiers are succumbing to the adverse effects of the vaccines they’ve been mandated by the government to take. In December 2020, the Military Health System started to administer the covid vax, and since then the military has inoculated 90.1 percent of those service members who are on active duty, 6.4 million doses in total. The Defense Medical Epidemiology Database (DMED) are in charge of ensuring soldiers are combat ready and the DMED is the Armed Forces Health Surveillance Branch’s “web-based tool to remotely query de-identified active component personnel and medical event data contained within the Defense Medical Surveillance System (DMSS).” Data from the DMED, was retrieved by attorneys Thomas Renz and Leigh Dundas via military whistleblowers, Drs. Samuel Sigoloff, Peter Chambers and Theresa Long – the data was given to Senator Ron Johnson during a round table meeting with lawyers and doctors. One of the military doctors testified: “It is my professional opinion that the major increases incidences of the above discussed instances of miscarriages, cancers, and disease were due to COVID-19 ‘vaccinations.’” The rate of medical issues that have been reported, has spiked by 1000 percent since the “vaccines” became available.
